coreAttributes.name: Arcane Blow Gun
coreAttributes.description: This two handed Blow gun is infused with a potent arcane enchantment, which, once loaded with the desired ammunition, extracts an arcane essence out of the user's aura, before converting it into a bolt of energy to be fired at the target.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot at [npc.name] with your Blow gun.

hitDescriptions.hitText: loading [npc.her] arcane blow gun and firing an ethereal energy, [npc.name] [npc.verb(hit)] [npc2.name] right in the chest, causing [npc2.herHim] to gasp and stagger back from the blow.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] arcane blow gun to fire an ethereal energy at [npc2.name], and [npc.verb(manage)] to [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane blow gun and [npc.verb(let)] loose, sending an ethereal energy to cut through the air and hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] arcane blow gun, [npc.name] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc2.name]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] arcane blow gun to fire an ethereal energy at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane blow gun and [npc.verb(let)] loose, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
